title: OCE PingTest
body:
open notepad.. create a file: call it whateva & dont forget where it is...

Save it.. run it.. im OCE NT AUS.. my time direct is 53ms.
WIN PRO 7 647.. Win response time.. verified.
Yet.. My game ping time is 100-600ms, Sometimes.. 

So go figure..

replies.body:
>Try a tracert to 103.240.227.5, which is in the range for OCE game servers.

>Bear in mind the server itself won't respond to pings, but you will be able to tell from the final hop which should be one of our peers...

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/tjYnaU0c-riot-plz-check-your-server?comment=0000

A ping test doesn't give you the full story, nor would it be a direct line to the server since if you pinged the server itself it just wouldn't respond.

Hey, I just created a thread with a similar problem. Would you mind posting in it and explaining your problem with a tracert result too? Hoping we can figure out what's causing this problem and get back to stomping noobs.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/UFP5Q1kz-telstra-nbn-tracert-results-25ms-ping-to-200ms-ping-throughout-ranked

I'm on the best net you can get in NZ, and the last day is just a nightmare on LoL.

It's not client side issues, there is something gone wrong...
